rules.name: Show_Access_Error
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6)) OR (7 AND (8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11))
rules.label: Show Access Error

rules.name: NO_Show_Error_Message_Email_Mobile
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR 5) AND ((6 AND 7) OR 8)
rules.label: NO, Show Error Message

fields.name: AccessErrorText
fields.fieldText: You are unable to schedule an appointment outside of your team.

fields.name: ErrorNoAccess
fields.fieldText: Please be advise that you do not have permission to schedule appointment. If you have concern, contact your administrator.

fields.name: FaultMessage
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Mobile_Or_Email_Is_Empty_Error_Message_Case
fields.fieldText: Before an appointment can be scheduled, please ensure that the following fields are complete on the lead / contact - Email, Mobile.

fields.name: Mobile_Or_Email_Is_Empty_Error_Message_Lead
fields.fieldText: Before an appointment can be scheduled, please ensure that the following fields are complete on the lead - Email, Mobile.

fields.name: Mobile_Or_Email_Is_Empty_Error_Message_Contact
fields.fieldText: Before an appointment can be scheduled, please ensure that the following fields are complete on the Contact - Email, Mobile.

fields.name: No_Lead_Or_Contact_Screen_Error_Message
fields.fieldText: An appointment can not be created from a case until a lead or contact is associated to the case.

fields.fieldText: Please complete the following to schedule an appointment.
